description: This file contains functions for generating JSON-RPC API headers, classes, enums, and stub code based on a JSON schema. It handles file creation, checks for updates, and manages code emission for a code generation tool.

classes.name: JsonRpcSchema
classes.description: A class used to encapsulate the JSON-RPC schema information extracted from the provided schema.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a header file defining the JSON-RPC API, including necessary includes and a header guard.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function that processes a schema to generate data classes, enums, version info, stubs, and RPC code based on configuration flags.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
